text:
Does anybody know if there is a way to read “category” field from an RSS feed (in emails)? It seems like even HubSpots own blog RSS feeds category field is omitted (edited)

Is there a Hubl way (function) fetching RSS data?

Hey guys,
Stupid question, is there any plugin for WebStorm? Cause it seems to not work for me and can't find any info
Hello everyone, is there a way to get width and height from *content.featured_image* ?
If you look at the developers info the values are blank
yes <@U38EZFVFE> values for featured_image_width and featured_image_height are set to 0
